_meta.title: Daily Guidance 오늘의 운세
_meta.description: Quick, actionable insights for navigating your day

The Fool.today: A day for new beginnings and spontaneity. Say yes to unexpected opportunities.
The Fool.korean: 새로운 시작과 즉흥성을 위한 날입니다. 예상치 못한 기회에 예라고 말하세요.
The Fool.afternoon: Take a small risk. Try something new.
The Fool.evening: Reflect on what new experiences taught you.
The Fool.caution: Don't be reckless, but don't be overly cautious either.
The Fool.action: Do one thing today that slightly scares you.

The Magician.today: Your personal power is strong. Take initiative and make things happen.
The Magician.korean: 개인적인 힘이 강합니다. 주도권을 잡고 일을 일어나게 만드세요.
The Magician.morning: Set clear intentions for the day.
The Magician.lucky: Lucky color: Red and white. Lucky number: 1.
The Magician.caution: Don't manipulate - use your power ethically.
The Magician.action: Accomplish one important task you've been putting off.

The High Priestess.today: Trust your intuition. Things may not be as they appear on the surface.
The High Priestess.korean: 직감을 신뢰하세요. 표면에 보이는 대로가 아닐 수 있습니다.
The High Priestess.morning: Listen to your first waking thoughts.
The High Priestess.evening: Pay attention to your dreams tonight.
The High Priestess.lucky: Lucky color: Blue and silver. Lucky number: 2.
The High Priestess.caution: Don't ignore gut feelings about people or situations.

The Empress.today: Nurture yourself and others. Creativity flows. Connect with nature.
The Empress.korean: 자신과 다른 사람을 돌보세요. 창의성이 흐릅니다. 자연과 연결하세요.
The Empress.afternoon: Express creativity or spend time in nature.
The Empress.evening: Create comfort and beauty around you.
The Empress.lucky: Lucky color: Green and pink. Lucky number: 3.
The Empress.caution: Don't neglect your own needs while caring for others.
The Empress.action: Do something creative or spend time outdoors.

The Emperor.today: Take charge. Focus on structure and getting things done efficiently.
The Emperor.korean: 책임을 지세요. 구조와 효율적으로 일을 완수하는 데 집중하세요.
The Emperor.morning: Make a structured plan for your day.
The Emperor.lucky: Lucky color: Red and orange. Lucky number: 4.
The Emperor.caution: Don't be too rigid or controlling.
The Emperor.action: Complete one task that requires discipline.

The Hierophant.today: Follow established methods. Seek advice from those with experience.
The Hierophant.korean: 확립된 방법을 따르세요. 경험 있는 사람들의 조언을 구하세요.
The Hierophant.afternoon: Consult mentors or experts if needed.
The Hierophant.evening: Reflect on what traditions serve you.
The Hierophant.lucky: Lucky color: Purple and white. Lucky number: 5.
The Hierophant.caution: Don't blindly follow rules that don't serve you.
The Hierophant.action: Learn something from someone more experienced.

The Lovers.today: Important choices. Focus on relationships and what you value most.
The Lovers.korean: 중요한 선택. 관계와 가장 소중히 여기는 것에 집중하세요.
The Lovers.afternoon: Make decisions aligned with your values.
The Lovers.lucky: Lucky color: Pink and orange. Lucky number: 6.
The Lovers.action: Tell someone important that you appreciate them.

The Chariot.today: Move forward with determination. Overcome obstacles through willpower.
The Chariot.korean: 결단력을 가지고 앞으로 나아가세요. 의지력으로 장애물을 극복하세요.
The Chariot.afternoon: Push through challenges. Don't give up.
The Chariot.lucky: Lucky color: Black and gold. Lucky number: 7.
The Chariot.caution: Don't run over others in your drive to succeed.
The Chariot.action: Make significant progress on a goal.

Strength.today: Lead with patience and compassion. Gentle persistence wins.
Strength.korean: 인내와 연민으로 이끌어가세요. 부드러운 끈기가 승리합니다.
Strength.morning: Approach the day with calm confidence.
Strength.afternoon: Handle challenges with patience, not force.
Strength.lucky: Lucky color: Gold and yellow. Lucky number: 8.
Strength.caution: Don't let impatience make you aggressive.
Strength.action: Handle one difficult situation with unusual patience.

The Hermit.today: Seek solitude for reflection. Your own wisdom is your guide.
The Hermit.korean: 성찰을 위해 고독을 찾으세요. 자신의 지혜가 안내자입니다.
The Hermit.lucky: Lucky color: Gray and blue. Lucky number: 9.
The Hermit.caution: Don't isolate when you need connection.
The Hermit.action: Spend at least 30 minutes in quiet reflection.

Wheel of Fortune.today: Changes are happening. Stay flexible and trust the turns.
Wheel of Fortune.korean: 변화가 일어나고 있습니다. 유연하게 유지하고 전환을 신뢰하세요.
Wheel of Fortune.afternoon: Go with the flow when things shift.
Wheel of Fortune.evening: Reflect on what changed and why.
Wheel of Fortune.lucky: Lucky color: Blue and purple. Lucky number: 10.

Justice.today: Focus on fairness and balance. Take responsibility for your actions.
Justice.korean: 공정함과 균형에 집중하세요. 행동에 책임을 지세요.
Justice.evening: Balance your accounts - literally or figuratively.
Justice.lucky: Lucky color: Green and white. Lucky number: 11.
Justice.action: Right one wrong or balance one scale.

The Hanged Man.today: Pause before acting. A different perspective is needed.
The Hanged Man.korean: 행동하기 전에 멈추세요. 다른 관점이 필요합니다.
The Hanged Man.afternoon: Try seeing a situation from another angle.
The Hanged Man.evening: Accept what you cannot change today.
The Hanged Man.action: Consciously pause before one major action.

Death.today: Let something end so something new can begin.
Death.lucky: Lucky color: Black and white. Lucky number: 13.
Death.caution: Don't hold on to what needs to go.
Death.action: Let go of one thing that no longer serves you.

Temperance.today: Seek balance in all things. Patience brings harmony.
Temperance.korean: 모든 일에서 균형을 찾으세요. 인내가 조화를 가져옵니다.
Temperance.evening: Don't overdo anything - balance work and rest.
Temperance.lucky: Lucky color: Blue and orange. Lucky number: 14.
Temperance.action: Practice moderation in one area where you typically overdo.

The Devil.today: Examine what's holding you back. Break one small chain.
The Devil.korean: 당신을 가로막는 것을 검토하세요. 작은 사슬 하나를 끊으세요.
The Devil.morning: Notice habits that don't serve you.
The Devil.lucky: Lucky color: Black and red. Lucky number: 15.
The Devil.action: Break one small unhealthy habit today.

The Tower.today: Expect disruptions. They clear the way for something better.
The Tower.korean: 혼란을 예상하세요. 더 나은 것을 위한 길을 열어줍니다.
The Tower.evening: Find the gift in any disruption.
The Tower.caution: Don't panic if things fall apart.
The Tower.action: If something breaks today, ask what it's making room for.

The Star.today: A day of hope and healing. Follow your inspiration.
The Star.lucky: Lucky color: Light blue and silver. Lucky number: 17.
The Star.caution: Don't let cynicism dim your light.
The Star.action: Share hope or inspiration with someone.

The Moon.today: Trust your intuition. Things may be confusing but will clarify.
The Moon.korean: 직감을 신뢰하세요. 혼란스러울 수 있지만 명확해질 것입니다.
The Moon.morning: Pay attention to dreams or early hunches.
The Moon.evening: Don't make major decisions while confused.
The Moon.lucky: Lucky color: Silver and purple. Lucky number: 18.
The Moon.action: Trust one intuition you'd normally dismiss.

The Sun.today: A bright, successful day. Celebrate and share your joy.
The Sun.korean: 밝고 성공적인 날. 축하하고 기쁨을 나누세요.
The Sun.lucky: Lucky color: Yellow and orange. Lucky number: 19.
The Sun.caution: Don't dim your light for others.

Judgement.today: A day for important decisions and honest self-assessment.
Judgement.korean: 중요한 결정과 솔직한 자기 평가를 위한 날.
Judgement.morning: Evaluate where you are in life.
Judgement.lucky: Lucky color: Red and white. Lucky number: 20.
Judgement.caution: Don't judge yourself or others too harshly.
Judgement.action: Make one decision you've been postponing.

The World.lucky: Lucky color: All colors. Lucky number: 21.
The World.caution: Don't rush to the next thing without celebrating.
The World.action: Complete one cycle and acknowledge it fully.

quick_guidance.length: Keep daily readings brief - 50-100 words max
quick_guidance.focus: What to do TODAY, not long-term predictions
